â•‘                                                            â•‘
â•‘              EZDINE PRINT BRIDGE                           â•‘
â•‘              Installation Guide                            â•‘
â•‘                                                            â•‘
â•šâ•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•

ğŸ“¦ STEP 1: EXTRACT FILES
   Extract this ZIP file to a permanent location
   Example: C:\EZDine\print-bridge (Windows)
           ~/Applications/EZDine/print-bridge (macOS)

ğŸš€ STEP 2: START PRINT BRIDGE

   macOS:
   ------
   1. Double-click "start-macos.command"
   2. If blocked: Right-click â†’ Open â†’ Open
   3. Terminal window will open showing print bridge status

   Windows:
   --------
   1. Double-click "start-windows.bat"
   2. Command window will open showing print bridge status

âš™ï¸ STEP 3: SETUP AUTO-START (Optional but Recommended)

   macOS:
   ------
   1. Double-click "setup-autostart-macos.command"
   2. Follow the prompts
   3. Print bridge will start automatically on login

   Windows:
   --------
   1. Right-click "setup-autostart-windows.bat"
   2. Select "Run as administrator"
   3. Follow the prompts
   4. Print bridge will start automatically on Windows startup

ğŸ”§ STEP 4: CONFIGURE EZDINE

   1. Open EZDine web application
   2. Go to Settings > Printing Setup
   3. Set Print Server URL: http://localhost:8080
   4. Click "Test Server" - should show success âœ…
   5. Configure your printer settings
   6. Click "Save Settings"
   7. Click "Test Print" - should print! ğŸ–¨ï¸

âœ… VERIFICATION

   You'll know it's working when:
   â€¢ Print bridge window shows "Print Bridge is running"
   â€¢ EZDine "Test Server" button shows success
   â€¢ Test prints appear in the print bridge console
   â€¢ Actual receipts print from your thermal printer

ğŸ” TROUBLESHOOTING

   Print bridge won't start:
   â€¢ macOS: Install Python 3 (python3 --version)
   â€¢ Windows: Install Python (python --version)

   Can't connect from EZDine:
   â€¢ Check print bridge is running
   â€¢ Verify URL is exactly: http://localhost:8080
   â€¢ Check firewall settings

   IP printing not working:
   â€¢ Verify printer IP address
   â€¢ Ensure printer is on same network
   â€¢ Check printer supports ESC/POS commands

ğŸ“ NEED HELP?

   Check the README.md file for detailed information
   or contact EZDine support.

â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•

   Thank you for using EZDine Print Bridge! ğŸ‰
